import axios from 'axios' import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import LineIcon from 'react-lineicons' import ProgressiveImage from 'react-progressive-image' import { Link, NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import ToggleSwitch from './toggleSwitch'; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { setTheme } from '../Redux/action' import ReactSwitch from 'react-switch'; const dispatch = useDispatch() const theme = useSelector((state) => state.reduxTheme.theme) const [lightMode, setLightMode] = useState(theme) lightMode ? document.body.classList.add('light') : document.body.classList.remove('light') useEffect(() => { setLightMode(theme) }, [theme]) function Header() { const [information, setInformation] = useState('') const [navigationToggler, setNavigationToggler] = useState(false) const handleNavigationToggler = () => { setNavigationToggler(!navigationToggler) } useEffect(() => { axios.get('/api/information').then((response) => { setInformation(response.data) }) }, []) return (
{(src) => }

{new Date().getFullYear()} © Maxon Corvil

) } export default Header
